14090.「……ククク。そうだったのか。\n この修行をこなすとは やはり\n お前は ポ:
...Kukuku. So that's how it is. If you're
doing this training, then you really are
Polfan's student.

14091.「オレも かつては あいつの弟子だった。\n 言うなれば お前の兄弟子ってとこだ:
I used to be his student once. In other words,
we are like brethren.

14092.「知ってるか？ <pc>。\n この修行をこなした奴だけが\n 伝説の旅芸人に:
Did you know, <pc>? That only
those who complete this training can come
close to becoming a legendary minstrel?

14093.「オレも 修行を終えたところだ。\n あの時は勝ちをゆずったが 今 この時におい:
I've also just finished my training. Victory
eluded me last time, but now you and I are
evenly matched.

14094.「フハハ！ オレは 誰にも止められねえ！\n いずれ最強となり 世の中から恐れら:
Hahaha! Nothing will stand in my way! I will
become the most powerful and legendary
minstrel the world has ever feared!

14095.「人を笑わせるだけで 満足してるような\n ふぬけた旅芸人をブッ殺してよおお！！:
I'll kill all those minstrels who are simply
content with making people laugh! I'll show
the world how worthless their tricks are!

14096.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。: ...You can't save people with simple tricks.

14097.「頭に たたきこんでおけ。<pc>。\n ポルファンは 人ひとり救えねえ クズ芸:
Get it into your head, <pc>.
Polfan is a pathetic minstrel who's incapable
of saving even a single life.
